articles.title: Kim Jong Il Greets Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Greets Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Thursday sent a message of greetings to Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and president of the Council of State, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations and fraternal salute to you, and through you, to the Communist Party and the government and people of Cuba on the occasion.
					
					 For the past five decades since the establishment of bilateral diplomatic ties, the DPRK and Cuba have steadily strengthened the bonds of friendship and cooperation, resolutely frustrating all the subversion and sabotage of the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys, under the uplifted banner of independence and socialism against imperialism.
					
					 Our people would as ever make positive efforts to boost the friendship and solidarity with the fraternal Cuban people based on the revolutionary principle.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we sincerely wish you greater success in your responsible work, reaffirming full support of our Party, government and people for the just cause of the party, government and people of Cuba to defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of socialism.

articles.title: Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Greetings from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, received a message of greetings from Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba and president of the Council of State, on Sunday.
					 The message said:
					
					 Dear comrades,
					
					 Please accept my fraternal greetings to you on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the Republic of Cuba and the DPRK.
					
					 Convinced that the relations of friendship, cooperation and solidarity between the parties, peoples and states of the two countries would continue to develop, I reassure you of my invariable support for the just cause of the Korean people to achieve the peaceful reunification of the whole of Korea. 
					
					 Yours sincerely.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Cuban FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Cuban FM 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of greetings to Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, foreign minister of Cuba, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 The two countries have steadily strengthened the fraternal ties and militant solidarity in the joint struggle for the cause of socialism against imperialism for the last five decades since the establishment of diplomatic ties, the message said, reaffirming the full support and solidarity with the cause of the Cuban people to defend the sovereignty of the country and the gains of socialism.

articles.title: N. Phyongan Provincial Meeting of Delegates for WPK Conference Held
articles.content:
N. Phyongan Provincial Meeting of Delegates for WPK Conference Held 
						
ugust 29 (KCNA) -- A meeting of delegates of North Phyongan Province of the Workers' Party of Korea took place in Sinuiju City on Thursday, according to Rodong Sinmun Sunday.
					 Attending the meeting were Choe Yong Rim, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, and delegates elected by city and county party committees and party organizations of units at different levels in the province and primary party organizations of bodies of the provincial level.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issue of electing delegates to the conference of the WPK.
					
					Kim Jae Ryong, secretary of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK who is delegate of the party organization of the People's Committee of the province, said in his speech on the election that General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the supreme representative of the WPK, symbol of the dignity and glory of the country and the nation and ever-victorious banner of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 He stressed it is the undying exploit performed by Kim Jong Il to shine for all ages that he strengthened in every way the Party and the army with his tireless Songun revolutionary leadership and demonstrated the dignity and honor of the country and the nation.
					
					 He referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il gave field guidance for tens of times to the province in the last 15 years, adding that thanks to his foresightedness and outstanding and tested leadership, shining successes of pushing back the frontiers of the latest science were registered in different fields of the national economy and radical changes were brought about in the field of agriculture in the province.
					
					 He courteously proposed the election of Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK, representing the unanimous desire of all the party members and people in the province.
					
					 The speakers at the meeting fully supported and approved the proposal.
					
					 A decision on electing Kim Jong Il as a delegate to the conference of the WPK was adopted at the meeting with a unanimous approval. 
					
					 The meeting also elected delegates to the conference of the WPK.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The delegation of political officials of the Vietnam People's Army led by Lieut. General Ngo Xuan Lich, deputy head of the General Political Department of the VPA, laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Sunday.
					 The wreath in the name of the delegation was laid before the cemetery.
					
					 The members of the delegation observed a silent moment in memory of the revolutionary martyrs who devoted their lives to the liberation of Korea, socialist construction and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Then they laid bouquets before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, anti-Japanese heroine, and paid silent tribute to her.

articles.title: Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK-Cuba Marked in Cuba
articles.content:
Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK-Cuba Marked in Cuba 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo, fine art and handicraft exhibition opened in Cuba on Wednesday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					Displayed in its venue were photos of President Kim Il Sung meeting Fidel Castro Ruz and high ranking officials and delegations of the party and government of Cuba, photos of General Secretary Kim Jong Il meeting Fidel Castro Ruz and other photos on the undying Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also put on display were works of the President and Kim Jong Il, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and fine art pieces and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talent of the Korean people.
					
					 Attending the opening ceremony of the exhibition were the vice minister of Trade and Foreign Investment, the vice-president of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples, the director of the department for Asian and Oceanic Affairs of the Foreign Ministry of Cuba, the deputy director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, the first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and other officials concerned, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of various countries in Cuba were present there on invitation.
					
					 The exhibition will go on until September 15.
					
					 A performance was given by Cuban artistes in Havana on August 20 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Youth and Students Vow to Urge Japan to Settle Its Crime-Woven History
articles.content:
Youth and Students Vow to Urge Japan to Settle Its Crime-Woven History 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Student Sub-Committee of the North Side Committee, the Youth and Students Headquarters of the South Side Committee and the Preparatory Committee for the Youth and Students Headquarters of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration Sunday published a joint resolution on the lapse of a century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by the Japanese Imperialists. 
					 The resolution manifested the will and pledge of youth and students of the north and the south and overseas to settle accounts with Japan for its crime-woven history against the Korean nation and firmly defend national sovereignty:
					
					 The youth and students in the north and the south and overseas will expose the crimes of aggression and plunder and all other state-sponsored crimes against humanity committed by the Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 We will bring to light the insidious moves of the Japanese militarists to distort the crime-woven history and their true intention  and conduct positive activities to foil those moves.
					
					 We brand the daily increasing political suppression of the Koreans in Japan by the Japanese reactionaries, human right abuses and the moves to grab Tok Islets and revive militarism as crimes of wantonly violating the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation and will wage unflinching struggle against them. 
					
					 The youth and students in the north and the south and overseas will not remain an onlooker to such military actions of foreign forces as the Japan "Self-Defence Forces'" inspection of naval exercises but decisively frustrate the moves by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation. 
					
					 We will consolidate the solidarity and alliance with the Koreans of different circles desirous of national reunification, peace and prosperity and frustrate all challenges and obstructive moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad by the concerted efforts of the whole nation to open a new phase for independent reunification at any cost. 
					
					 We will always stand in the van of the nation's dynamic grand advance to defend and implement to the last the north-south joint declaration, the great program for independent reunification and banner for defending peace.

articles.title: Koreans Called upon to turn out in Struggle against Japanese Militarists
articles.content:
Koreans Called upon to turn out in Struggle against Japanese Militarists
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The North Side Council for the Reunification of Tangun's Nation and the South Side Council for the Peace and Reunification of Tangun's Nation Sunday issued a north-south joint declaration of a meeting for history of national independence for defending national sovereignty on the lapse of a century since the Japanese imperialists fabricated and promulgated by force the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" and annexed the whole of Korea. 
					 Noting that the Japanese imperialists are the sworn enemies as they trampled down upon the state sovereignty of Korea and tried to stamp out the Korean nation for good and all, the declaration called for forcing them to pay for those crimes generation after generation.
					
					 It added:
					
					 Japan is distorting its history of aggression and becoming undisguised in its moves to grab Tok Islets to stage a comeback to Korea, far from making sincere apology and reparation for the hideous thrice-cursed crimes it committed by inflicting untold misfortune and disaster upon the Korean people in the past.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is the fact that the conservative sycophantic forces who threw away the spirit of the Tangun's nation have staged reckless war exercises against the north almost everyday while tightening military tie-up with the Japanese reactionaries after drawing them into the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces in a bid to bring the disaster of a nuclear war to fellow countrymen. 
					
					 We declare as follows to fulfill the mission as members of the Tangun's nation at the call of the era reflecting the demand and wish of the nation:
					
					 We will stage dynamic patriotic struggle for independence and reunification of the country against foreign forces holding high the slogan "Let the Whole Nation Unite under the Banner of Inter-Korean Joint Declaration and Achieve National Reunification at an Early Date!"
					
					 The national movement organizations in the north and the south will turn out in the sacred struggle to decisively reject the moves of foreign forces for domination, interference and war provocation against the Korean nation and foil the ambition of the Japanese militarists for reinvasion. 
					
					 We will dynamically conduct mass movement to force Japan to make apology for its past crimes and redress them with historical occasions this year as momentum. 
					
					 National movement organizations related to Tangun in the north and the south will decisively frustrate in firm unity the moves of anti-reunification forces to scuttle the inter-Korean relations and conduct the vigorous movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration through solidarity and alliance.

articles.title: 6.15 Committee Urges Japan to Redress Its Crime-Woven History
articles.content:
6.15 Committee Urges Japan to Redress Its Crime-Woven History 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The North Side, the South Side and the Overseas Side Committees for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement Sunday on the lapse of a century since the fabrication and promulgation of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by the Japanese imperialists.
					 The Japanese imperialists' forcible fabrication of the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" and the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" brought unprecedentedly horrific misfortune, pain and disaster to the Korean nation, the statement said.
					
					 Japan, however, has justified its aggression and, moreover, has persisted in hostile acts against the Korean nation as evidenced by its territorial claim to Tok Islets, far from making due apology and reparation for its crimes, it noted, and stressed:
					
					 Firstly, Japan should make thorough-going apology and reparation for its aggression and colonial rule over Korea and the unspeakable disaster and pain suffered by the Korean nation at the hands of Japan.
					
					 Japan should declare totally null and void before the Koreans and the world all kinds of "treaties" including the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" and the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by which it enforced the colonial rule over the Korean nation.
					
					 It should make apology and reparation for all forms of monstrous crimes it committed against the Korean nation for a century including the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, forcible drafting and conscription and massacre and unconditionally return all cultural artifacts it took from Korea.
					
					 Secondly, Japan should immediately stop unjust discrimination, political persecution and suppression of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It should stop the suppression of Koreans in Japan and its unwarranted discrimination against Korean schools and ensure on a preferential basis the rights of the Koreans in Japan including the right to existence and the right to national education.
					
					 Thirdly, Japan should immediately stop distorting history by whitewashing Japan's history of colonization, the moves to grab Tok Islets and its persistent attempt to revive militarism.
					
					 In particular, it should abolish the DPRK-Japan hostile relations and no longer stand in the way of peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The statement appealed to all the Koreans at home and abroad to turn out in the just patriotic movement to defend the national dignity and force Japan to redress its crime-woven history.

articles.title: Holding Fast to WPK's Line of Economic Construction Called for
articles.content:
Holding Fast to WPK's Line of Economic Construction Called for
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- To preferentially develop national defence industry while simultaneously developing light industry and agriculture is the Workers' Party of Korea's line of economic construction in the Songun era. This is a strategic line as its validity and vitality have been proved in the practical struggle of the Songun revolution glorified with great victories and miracles.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This line is a successful inheritance of the basic line of socialist economic construction the vitality of which has been fully proved in the drive to build a socialist power --independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence--and it also represents the in-depth development of the basic line in keeping with the requirements of the times and developing revolution.
					
					 The line of economic construction in the Songun era serves as a treasured sword to win one victory after another in the drive to firmly defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country, a powerful weapon for bringing earlier the triumphant building of an economic power by pushing ahead with the overall development of the national economy based on heavy industry and correct guidelines for drastically improving the standard of people's living through the high-pitched drive to bring about a radical turn in light industry and agriculture.
					
					 The DPRK holds a full-fledged position as a country that launched satellites and had access to nukes and is demonstrating its independent dignity as an invincible socialist power. This is a shining fruition of the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il who set forth the line of economic construction in the Songun era long ago and gave top priority to the development of the national defence industry.
					
					 The DPRK is stepping up the modernization of overall national economy including machine building industry with a firm grip on the eminence of CNC technology. This would have been unthinkable without the guidance provided by the WPK to give full play to the might of the DPRK's economic structure with main emphasis on defence industry and heavy industry and remarkably boost the nation's economic potential with it as a powerful driving force.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Friendship between DPRK and Cuba
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Friendship between DPRK and Cuba 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday dedicates a signed article to the 50th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 The paper says that for the last five decades the peoples of the DPRK and Cuba have fully demonstrated the might of the friendly relations between the two countries that were forged in the joint struggle to defend socialism.
					
					 The Korean people have extended full support and solidarity to the Cuban people in their struggle to honorably defend the gains of the revolution while defeating the imperialists' aggression and interference from the very day they gained victory in the Cuban revolution, the daily says, and goes on:
					
					 The Cuban people have extended full support and encouragement to the struggle of the Korean people who are dashing ahead like wind toward a thriving socialist nation holding high the red flag of the revolution without the slightest vacillation and pessimism despite the pressure and sanctions on the part of the imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The solidity and invincibility of the bilateral friendship have been consolidated thanks to President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, and Fidel Castro, leader of the Cuban revolution.
					
					 Under the leadership of Fidel Castro and Raul Castro the Cuban people have achieved great successes in their struggle to defend the country, revolution and socialism while frustrating the vicious moves of the imperialists to isolate and suffocate Cuba.
					
					 Well aware that only socialism can guarantee their happy life and bright future, the Cuban people have unswervingly followed the road of independence and socialism against imperialism, holding high the slogan of revolution and struggle "Socialism or death, we will win!"
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK to support the Cuban revolution and invariably strengthen the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 The Korean people will as ever make positive efforts to continue to develop the traditional friendly and cooperative relations with the Cuban people based on the revolutionary principle and comradely obligation.

articles.title: Death List of Koreans Drafted to Japan Opened to Public
articles.content:
Death List of Koreans Drafted to Japan Opened to Public 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The death list of Koreans who were forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists in the past was opened to the public, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The Committee for Supporting Investigation into Victims of Forcible Drafting and Death of Those Drafted to Foreign Countries in the Period of Resistance against Japan Thursday referred to the confirmation by the Japanese government of the list of 5,600 Koreans who were killed at enterprises, coal mines and other places of Japan after being forcibly taken there during the Japanese imperialists' occupation of Korea.
					
					 This brings to light the history of crimes Japan committed against Koreans in the past as this data bears witness to the damage done to the Korean victims of forcible drafting in the above-said period.

articles.title: Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Solution to Issue of Sexual Slavery Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and those who fell victims to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army held the 932nd Wednesday meeting outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on August 25.
					Read out at the meeting was a declaration in the name of 3,307 members from all walks of life and overseas Koreans demanding the solution to the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army on the lapse of the century since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty." It was followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers said that the urgent task for this year is to wrest Japan's apology and reparation for the crimes related to the sexual slavery.
					
					 A statement made public by the Japanese prime minister on the lapse of the century since the fabrication of the said treaty, however, did not mention at all the crimes perpetrated by the Japanese imperialists in the past, they charged.
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army should never be forgotten, they stressed, urging the Japanese government and Diet to enact a law on settling the issue and make official apology and reparation for the past crimes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Treachery Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea made public a statement on August 25 in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for its sycophancy toward Japan.
					 The statement accused the Lee regime of its moves to get warships of the Japan "Self-Defense Force" involved in the PSI-related maritime interception and search drills to be staged at Pusan Port and in waters off it in October.
					
					 It is hard to repress resentment against the authorities' traitorous act to let the Japan SDF take part in the north-targeted military exercises this year which marks the centenary since the fabrication of the brigandish "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty", it said, adding:
					
					 It is an intolerable act of treachery to seek to plug aggressors into war exercises against fellow countrymen.
					
					 The statement urged the Lee group of traitors to stop at once sycophancy toward Japan as evidenced by the involvement of the Japan SDF into the maneuvers, increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Moves Denounced
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Puppet Forces' War Moves Denounced
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Personages of Bangladesh, Italy and Nepal released statements to denounce the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises staged by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces. 
					 Mujahidul Islam Selim, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, in a statement on August 23 branded the largest-ever Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises, which were staged with various types of the latest war equipment and huge armed forces involved, as an undisguised military provocation apparently targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 Fully supporting the just stand of the DPRK which was clarified through an answer given by a spokesman for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, he strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop at once the dangerous war exercises.
					
					 Flavio Pettinari, representative of the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Songun Idea in Fermo of Italy, in a statement on August 20 said that the reality clearly proves that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities are the harassers of peace and war maniacs who bring dark clouds of a new war to hang over the land of Korea, expressing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the peaceful reunification.
					
					 Surya Lal, chairman of the Peace Action Committee of Nepal, in a statement on August 22 demanded the U.S. and the south Korean authorities stop at once all kinds of joint military exercises and opt for peaceful settlement of the pending issues on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Songun Idea Praised as Revolutionary Idea of 21st Century
articles.content:
Songun Idea Praised as Revolutionary Idea of 21st Century
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 23 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il's field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960 was the embodiment of the Songun idea which calls for putting forward the military affairs as the most important state affairs.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership is a successful application of the practical experience of the Korean revolution that started and has advanced with the arms, the statement noted, adding that the KPA has performed great feats in the struggle to defend the country from the imperialists' aggression moves under his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Saying that the Songun idea serves as the revolutionary idea of the 21st century that gives encouragement and impetus to the world revolution and the anti-imperialist struggle, the statement called upon the progressive people of the world to conduct dynamic activities to study and disseminate the Songun idea and politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Praised 
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Bangladesh, Finland and Kyrgyzstan and seminars and film shows in Russia, Pakistan and Nepal between August 20 and 23 to mark the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, in his speech at the meeting said that Kim Jong Il, convinced that the arms guarantee the victory of the popular masses' cause of independence and socialist cause and the prosperity of the country and the nation, has led the Korean people along the ever-victorious road with his original Songun politics.
					
					 Kalevi Warman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, in a speech said that the Songun politics is recognized as the original political mode on the international arena, expressing belief that the Workers' Party and the people of Korea will open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 without fail thanks to the Songun politics. 
					
					 A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgys El" Republican Political Party, said in a speech that the Korean People's Army has grown to be an invincible army thanks to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and the Korean people will win victory after victory under his Songun leadership. 
					
					 S. Z. Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, said in a seminar that the achievements made by Songun Korea in the socialist construction and the KPA which has grown to be an invincible powerful army, in particular, clearly testify to the validity and vitality of the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il possessed of clairvoyant wisdom. 
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meeting and the seminar held in Finland and Nepal.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched such Korean films as "Army of Korea".

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovskaya Krayevaya Tipografia Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution. Also expounded in it are the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.
